about.formula_en: See full schedule at the CDC's website for children and adults.

creator.name: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

creator_info.about_en: The CDC is the leading national public health agency in the US. It focuses on infectious disease, food borne pathogens, environmental health, occupational safety and health, health promotion, injury prevention, and educational activities designed to improve public health. More information can be found on the CDC website.

how_to_use.pearls_pitfalls_en: This calculator is meant to provide a general schedule of vaccination doses. Clinical judgment and knowledge of past vaccinations should guide decision to provide vaccinations to patients.

next_steps.advice_en: Make sure to discuss vaccination and immunization safety with the patient and have a full understanding the patient's history before administration.

instructions_en: This is based on the CDC's dosing schedule. Clinical judgment and knowledge of past vaccinations should guide decision to provide vaccinations to patients.
medium_description_en: Determines what immunizations/vaccinations are due based on a patient's age.

seo.meta_description_en: The Immunization Schedule Calculator determines doses of vaccinations due based on age.
seo.keywords_en: Immunization Schedule Calculator, vaccination Schedule Calculator, vaccination schedule, immunization schedule, tdap, mmr, measles, rubella, mumps, varicella, zoster, pneumococcal, meningococcal, meningitis, flu, influenza, tetanus, whooping cough, pertussis, hpv, gardisil
